Name: SOK MAX
About the game: SOK MAX is a sokoban classic puzzle game, the sequel of the SOK puzzle. Now there are more boxes on each level. The goal of the game is to move all the boxes to their positions. It's not as easy as it seems. The player can push one box at a time, but do not pull it off. ■ Fascinating gameplay; ■ 50 awesome levels with more boxes on each level; ■ No background music, just You and the Game; ■ 53 meme achievements; ■ Cloud Saves; ■ Trading cards, backgrounds & emoticons: will be added as soon as it becomes available, according to the rules of Steam.
